item.tatsu.strange_tablet.tooltip: A strange tablet that seems to be made of a mysterious material. Maybe it has some hidden power?
item.tatsu.aurelazure.tooltip.1: The blade seems to be made out of a strange light blue gem
item.tatsu.aurelazure.tooltip.1.1: that is different than the one you know.
item.tatsu.aurelazure.tooltip.2: While holding the sword you feel more nimble.
